name: DiscoverConnectionProfileRequest
description:
Request message for 'discover' ConnectionProfile request.

params.name: data

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The parent resource of the connection profile type. Must be in the format projects/*/locations/*.

params.name: data.connection_profile_name
params.description: A reference to an existing connection profile.

params.description: Whether to retrieve the full hierarchy of data objects (TRUE) or only the current level (FALSE).

params.description: The number of hierarchy levels below the current level to be retrieved.

params.description: Oracle RDBMS to enrich with child data objects and metadata.

params.description: MySQL RDBMS to enrich with child data objects and metadata.

params.description: PostgreSQL RDBMS to enrich with child data objects and metadata.
